text.autoconfig.codeutilities.title: CodeUtilities
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.dfB: Adds a button in title screen to join DiamondFire.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.ite: Used for sending items from third party programs.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.che: Makes all chests look like barrels.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.sig: Required distance for signs to render.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.var: Shows variable type (GAME, SAVE, LOCAL) under the item name.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.aut: Automatically runs /rc on entering dev mode.
Automatically runs /time on entering dev or build mode.
Automatically enables Night Vision on entering dev or build mode.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.dis: Shows where you are in DiamondFire on Discord user profile.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.dfC: Enables the commands that work only in DiamondFire.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.err: Plays a sound when the mod sends error messages.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.hea: Amount of heads to display in /heads menu.
text.autoconfig.codeutilities.option.col: Amount of color bars to display in one color line.
Amount of lines to show in /color.
codeutilities.command.require_creative_m: You must be in creative mode to use this command!
